shinycoreci 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference

Test apps using shiny::runTests()

runtests.Rd

Test apps using shiny::runTests()

test_runtests(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_runtests(dir, filter = filter),
  filter = NULL,
  assert = TRUE,
  timeout = as.difftime(10, units = "mins"),
  retries = 2,
  update_pkgs = TRUE,
  update_app_pkgs = TRUE
)

test_shinytest(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_shinytest(dir),
  assert = TRUE,
  retries = 3
)

test_shinyjster(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_shinyjster(dir),
  assert = TRUE,
  retries = 3
)

test_testthat(
  dir = "apps",
  apps = apps_testthat(dir),
  assert = TRUE,
  retries = 3
)

Arguments

dir

base folder to look for applications
apps

applications within dir to run
filter

filter to use on test file within application
assert

logical value which will determine if assert_runtests() will be called on the result
timeout

Length of time allowed for an application's full test suit can run before determining it is a failure
retries

number of attempts to retry before declaring the test a failure
update_pkgs

Logical value which will try to install all required shiny packages used for testing
update_app_pkgs

Logical value which will try to install all required app packages used for testing

Functions

  • test_runtests: Generic method to call all testing files

  • test_shinytest: Only execute shinytest.R test files

  • test_shinyjster: Only execute shinyjster.R test files

  • test_testthat: Only execute testtat.R test files
